subject: SSN1567 status
description_text:
Hi, I am checking in on the shipping status of this item, order SSN1567. It
has been 2 weeks since I purchased the pedal plate and it is still being
prepared for shipping. Just wanting to make sure the order hasn't been
missed and hoping it can be sent relatively soon.

Thank you,
Bradley Tidwell

conversations.body_text: Hi Bradley Tidwell,  I noticed that the baseplate order you placed on May 30th hasn't been shipped yet. I’ll immediately contact our operations team to confirm whether it has been dispatched — the tracking number might have been missed.      #SSN1573  I noticed that the baseplate order you placed on May 30th hasn't been shipped yet. I’ll immediately contact our operations team to confirm whether it has been dispatched — the tracking number might have been missed.

Hi Bradley Tidwell,  Hello, apologies for the earlier mistake. You did not order a voice coil motor — your order is for a PlusX baseplate. The baseplate is expected to arrive at our U.S. warehouse in the next few days, and we will ship it to you as soon as it arrives.

Thank you for the quick reply and update.

I appreciate it and look forward to its arrival.

Thank you,
Bradley Tidwell

On Thu, Jun 12, 2025 at 9:00 PM service@simsonn.com
